component.name: veraPDF
component.summary: veraPDF is a file-format validator for PDF/A archiving standard

description.p: veraPDF is a purpose-built, open source, file-format validator covering all PDF/A parts and conformance levels. veraPDF is designed to meet the needs of digital preservationists and is supported by the PDF software developer community.

ul.li: New version 1.22.3
Added HTML and JSON report formats in the CLI app.
Fixed CLI scripts for Windows to support arbitrary characters in the veraPDF installation folder.
Fixed file drag&drop functionality for the GUI app on macOS.
Force MRR report format if policy checks are enabled.
Added support for user-specific config directory.
Aded option to include all warnings into the validation report (both GUI and CLI)
added verbosity level to CLI app to control the level of visible warnings
exit after displaying a help message if CLI is invoked without parameters
Fixed check for veraPDF updates from the GUI app.
Added support for evaluating PDF functions.
Added support for PDF 2.0 namespace mechanism.
Added support for standard structure types in PDF 2.0 namespace.
Added support for Java 17.
Added support for Java Platform Module System (JPMS)
New version 1.20.3
Minor patch to improve handling of out of memory errors.
New version 1.20.1
This supercedes the previous 2.0.72 build released in error.
The official build of the latest veraPDF version.
Adds PDF/A-4 support including Level F and Level E
Support of Java 11 through 16
Improved: handling of malicious docs., parsing of PostScript and CFF fonts
Flathub package improvement minor release:
Adds command line version of the program, it can be run from terminal as:
flatpak run --command=verapdf-cli org.verapdf.veraPDF --help
Various updates
